=== Current Issues ===
No power down at shutdown. No suspend to RAM, no suspend to disk. The ACPI part of the BIOS seems to be buggy and there is no upgrade available. The bugginess can be seen from the available frequency tables; with a 1.33Ghz Core2Duo processor the available frequencies are only 600 and 800Mhz. You get full speed only by rmmod acpi-cpufreq.
